Name: Into the Oven
Description: Deal 2 damage. If this action was spiced, deal 4 damage instead.

Name: Preheat
Description:
Gain 3 vitality.
Rotate this action.
If you are the Baker's partner, spice your next action three times.

Name: Second Helping
Description:
Rotate this action.
If you are the Baker's partner, perform your draw ability.

Name: List the Ingredients
Description:
Rotate any number of actions or resources on your field and/or on your partner's field.
Remove 2 time counters from each duration.

Name: Into the Oven
Description:
Deal 3 damage.
Spice your next action twice.
